external_games.name: Het Huis Anubis: Het geheim van Osiris

name: Het Huis Anubis: Het geheim van Osiris
summary: The residents of The House of Anubis need your help! This adventurous game takes you to an abandoned inn, a beautiful garden full of ancient artifacts, and even to distant Egypt. You embark on a miraculous journey through time and find yourself in the world of the original inhabitants of the House of Anubis: the Winsbruggen-van Hennegouwen couple and their daughter. Can you solve the puzzles, find the treasures, and uncover the Secret of Osiris?

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Het Huis Anubis: Het Geheim Van Osiris (NINTENDO DS SPEL RECLAME)
